div.div:
* Network - Yordan
* Compliance Reporting - Pete?
* Data Collection - Vladimir (Collect the data and dump into a Time Series DB)
* Data Evaluation - Lawrence (Collect the TS data, evalaute against YAML Write) and output to relational DB)
